Wings: A full pound of hand breaded chicken wings served with korean bbq, buffalo, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq or spicy honey garlic sauce
Chicken Tenders: crispy breaded chicken served buffalo style, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq, korean bbq, spicy honey garlic
Fried Pickles: sour and crispy served with buttermilk ranch
GoGo Bites: deep fried bites filled with jalapenos, roasted corn, bacon & cream cheese, deep fried and served with BBQ drizzle

New England Clam Chowder: thick and creamy, made with fresh clams, bacon, celery, onion & potatoes
Summer Salad: baby watermelon, cherry tomatoes, red onion, feta, lemon honey dressed arugula
Garden Salad: cucumbers, tomatoes, carrots, red onions, peppers and croutons on mixed greens

Roasted Mushroom & Goat Cheese Flatbread: roasted garlic puree, cremini mushrooms, herbed goat cheese topped with balsamic arugula salad
BLT Flatbread: pemi dip base, bacon, tomatoes, chopped spinach, spicy mayo drizzle

menu_items.subtitle: Served w/house potato chips and a pickle.  Substitute hand cut fries or house salad for $2, truffle fries for $2.50. Add a side salad to any Sandwich for $3. Substitute a gluten free roll to any sandwich for $2

Chicken Sandwich: grilled chicken w/ cheddar, bacon, lettuce, tomato & onion, garlic aioli. Served on a brioche roll
Lulu's Big Dog: quarter pound hot dog on grilled brioche bun with sautéed peppers & onions, stone ground mustard
Pemi Sliders*: 2 angus beef patties topped with cheddar, bacon, garlic aioli, lettuce & tomato, on grilled brioche.  Served w/hand cut fries
Quinoa 'Burger': red quinoa, lentil and roasted garlic “burger” w/marinated tomato, pickled red onion, arugula, herbed goat cheese, garlic aioli on brioche roll
Lobster Roll: tossed lightly in garlic aioli on grilled brioche

menu_items.subtitle: Add a side salad to any meal for $3

Asian Chicken: marinated chicken over vegetable slaw, finished with sweet soy glaze and sesame seeds. Served with chilled lo mein salad
Grilled Ahi Tuna*: soy lime grilled ahi tuna, smashed avocado, cucumber ginger salad served w/basmati rice
Naan Tacos: adobo pulled chicken, cotija cheese, roasted corn, pico de gallo, cilantro lime sour cream on mini naan
Try it veg style! (sub black beans for chicken)

Rose Spritzer: josh rose, saint elder, soda, fresh mint
Sinner: pbr hard coffee, peanut butter whiskey, on the rocks topped with reese's puffs
Dirty Unicorn: cucumber mint vodka, lemonade, tonic, empress indigo gin
Skinny Margarita: hornitos silver, fresh lime, cointreau (try it with blackberry!)
Shark Week: island pucker, pineapple juice, truly wild berry draft
Strawberry Patch Mule: strawberry vodka, ginger beer, soda, fresh lime, touch of grenadine
East Branch Bourbon Tea: bourbon, peach tree, lemonade, iced tea, fresh mint
